description.narrative:
Additional detail on PEPFAR financial information and terminology can be found at https://data.pepfar.gov/financial. The PEPFAR IATI activity file and PEPFAR IATI Activity File User's Guide can be found at https://data.pepfar.gov/additionalData
Although initially proposd as a single TBD mechanism for provision of technical assistance in antiretroviral treatment; after HQ treatment input, CDC will be funding two mechanisms to provide this assistance. The new TBD will be funded for $1,300,000 to provide ongoing technical assistance to national and site level treatment sites through an in-country team of treatment experts. The existing CDC- Funds allocated for Program Element HL.1.11: Treatment/Adult Treatment. Including infrastructure, training clinicians and other providers, exams, clinical monitoring, related laboratory services, and community-adherence activities. objectives

Although initially proposd as a single TBD mechanism for provision of technical assistance in antiretroviral treatment; after HQ treatment input, CDC will be funding two mechanisms to provide this assistance. The new TBD will be funded for $1,300,000 to provide ongoing technical assistance to national and site level treatment sites through an in-country team of treatment experts. The existing CDC-HHS centrally administered cooperative agreement for treatment technical assistance with ICAP Columbia University will be funded for $500,00 to supply international experts and expertise.

participating-org.narrative: Trustees Of Columbia University In The City Of New York
U.S. Department of Health and Human Services/Centers for Disease Control and Prevention
U.S. Department of Health and Human Services/Centers for Disease Control and Prevention

organisation.narrative: Office of the Global AIDS Coordinator

mailing-address.narrative: 2100 Pennsylvania Avenue, Suite 200, Washington, DC 20522, USA

policy-marker.narrative: The U.S. President's Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief (PEPFAR) is the U.S. government's response to the global HIV/AIDS epidemic and represents the largest commitment by any nation to address a single disease in history.

title.narrative: Annual Reports to Congress on the President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
PEPFAR Fiscal Year 2019 Country Operational Plan Guidance
Audit of the Department of State’s Coordination and Oversight of the U.S. President’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief
